snippet: In the job market, people with disabilities bring vast experience in coping and adapting — qualities that help them become valuable employees.
abstract: Peggy Klaus Preoccupations column contends that in the job market, people with disabilities bring vast experience in coping and adapting--qualities that help them become valuable employees.
lead_paragraph: In the job market, people with disabilities bring vast experience in coping and adapting — qualities that help them become valuable employees.

headline.print_headline: A Chance To See Disabilities As Assets
headline.main: A Chance to See Disabilities as Assets
